dict.string: Get the next position and increment `pointIndex`:\ `let position = points[pointIndex]`\ `pointIndex += 1`

Reset `pointIndex` so it stays within the array bounds:\ `if pointIndex == points.count {`\ ` pointIndex = 0`\ `}`\ Or, better still, use the modulo (%) operator:\ `let position = points[pointIndex % points.count]`
